scripts.contrib-wiz: uglifyjs bookmarklets/link-to-contrib-wizard.js -c -m -o cw.min.js; node -e 'console.log(encodeURIComponent(process.argv[1]))' "$(cat cw.min.js)" | sed -e 's/^/javascript:/' | pbcopy
scripts.login-link: uglifyjs bookmarklets/login-linkify.js -c -m -o ll.min.js; node -e 'console.log(encodeURIComponent(process.argv[1]))' "$(cat ll.min.js)" | sed -e 's/^/javascript:/' | pbcopy
